name: recorder_characters
description: Recorder should only contain alphabetic characters and spaces.

name: event_id_values
description: Event ID can only contain the values "Low", "High", and "Flood"

name: sample_type_values
description: Sample Type can only contain "Surface Whole", "Mid Column Whole", "Surface Net", "Mid Column Net", "Net Spike", "Whole Spike", "Net Blank", or "Whole Blank"
rule: sample_type %vin% c("Surface Whole", "Mid Column Whole", "Surface Net", "Mid Column Net", "Net Spike", "Whole Spike", "Net Blank", "Whole Blank")

name: replicate_id_values
description: Replicate ID can only be a number between 1 and 4

name: collection_date_range
description: Collection Date can only be a date between 2022-09-01 and 2023-09-01

name: non_completions_net
description: If the sample type is net, there must be values for the flow meter readings.

name: key_unique
description: Combinations of Station ID, Event ID, Sample Type, and Replicate ID cannot be repeated.

name: recorder_field_length
description: Recorder should have at least 2 characters and no more than 30.
